issue.title: Build SplitSync - Final Test
issue.body:
Build SplitSync, a modern expense sharing application similar to Splitwise.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 16.1.4 with App Router
- TypeScript 5.9.3
- Drizzle ORM with SQLite
- Socket.io for real-time updates
- Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui for UI
- Playwright for E2E testing

## Core Features
1. User authentication and session management
2. Group creation and management
3. Expense tracking (who paid, split type, amount, date, description, category)
4. Multiple split methods (equal, exact amounts, percentages, shares)
5. Balance calculations (who owes whom)
6. Settlement tracking (partial and full settlements)
7. Real-time updates via WebSocket
8. Expense activity feed

## Requirements
- Complete database schema with all tables
- Authentication with secure password hashing
- RESTful API for all operations
- Responsive UI with modern design
- Real-time updates using Socket.io
- E2E tests with Playwright

The implementation should be production-ready with proper error handling, validation, and edge cases covered.

ems.task: Project Setup - Create all configuration files including .gitignore, package.json, tsconfig.json, next.config.js, tailwind.config.ts, postcss.config.js, .env.example, ESLint/Prettier configs, Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, .github/workflows/ci.yml with lint/typecheck/test/build jobs, and comprehensive README.md. NO src/ directory creation - this is config/infrastructure only.

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync - a modern expense sharing application with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, and Socket.io. Implementation includes user authentication, group management, expense tracking with multiple split methods, balance calculations, settlements, real-time WebSocket updates, and comprehensive E2E testing with Playwright.

pendingEMs.task: Authentication System - Implement complete authentication with bcrypt password hashing, JWT tokens, session management, and NextAuth.js configuration. Create login/signup API routes, middleware for protected routes, and auth context provider. Includes secure cookie handling and session validation.

Group Management API - Implement all group-related API endpoints including create group, join group, leave group, list groups, group details, add/remove members, and member role management. Includes request validation, error handling, and authorization checks.

Expense Management API - Implement expense tracking endpoints with full CRUD operations. Support all split types (equal, exact amounts, percentages, shares), expense categories, and multi-currency support. Includes validation, balance calculation logic, and transaction management.

Settlement and Balance API - Implement settlement endpoints for recording partial/full settlements, calculating who owes whom, and generating balance summaries. Includes settlement history, payment tracking, and debt simplification algorithms.

Real-time Updates with Socket.io - Implement WebSocket server and client for real-time expense updates, group changes, settlement notifications, and activity feed. Create event handlers for connection management, room-based broadcasts, and event typing.

UI Components Library - Build reusable shadcn/ui components including Button, Input, Card, Dialog, Form, Select, Avatar, Badge, and specialized expense components (ExpenseCard, BalanceCard, SettlementCard, SplitMethodSelector). Includes comprehensive theming and responsive design.

Application Pages - Implement all page-level components and layouts including authentication pages (login/signup), dashboard, group list/create views, expense creation/editing forms, settlement interface, and activity feed. Includes data fetching, loading states, and error handling.

E2E Testing with Playwright - Write comprehensive end-to-end tests for all critical user flows: authentication, group management, expense creation with all split types, settlement recording, balance calculations, and real-time updates. Includes test fixtures, page objects, and test data management.
